name: Luminous_Fists
display_help: You pummel your target with your fists, which are wreathed in a brilliant energy. In addition to Smashing and Energy damage, this attack has a chance to reduce your target's Energy Resistance and Defense.

name: Luminous_Bolt
display_help: A quick attack that rapidly hurls small bolts of light at foes, sometimes knocking them down. Fast, but little damage.

name: Luminous_Strike
display_help: You bring your fists down on your target in a powerful attack. In addition to Smashing and Energy damage, this attack reduces your target's defenses against Energy attacks and has a chance to knock them off their feet.

name: Incandescent_Burst
display_help: You fire a luminous projectile at the target, dazzling them. This reduces their chance to hit and their damage, while inspiring you and increasing your own damage.

name: Radiant_Burst
display_help: You channel energy through your Lightstaff, resulting in a massive burst of energy whose brightness temporarily exceeds that of the sun. The energy output is large enough to potentially cause your target to catch fire, and may overwhelm their senses so much that they lose Endurance.

name: Slash
display_help: You perform a quick Slash that can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. This attack causes moderate damage, but has a quick recharge time. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Fast

name: Hack
display_help: You Hack your opponent for a high amount of damage. This attack can reduce a target's Defense, making him easier to hit. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

name: Spear_of_Light
display_help: You discharge a beam of energy from your sword, striking the target for high damage. Damage: High, Recharge: Moderate

name: Slice
display_help: You Slice your sword in a wide arc, attacking all enemies in front of you. Slice does less damage than Slash, but can hit multiple foes and reduces their defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Moderate

name: Whirling_Sword
display_help: You perform a Whirling Sword maneuver, attacking all foes in melee range. This attack wounds your opponents, causing them to take minor damage over time and reduces their defense. Damage: Moderate, Recharge: Slow

name: Luminous_Barrier
display_help: Luminous Barrier creates an energy barrier that can deflect physical attacks. Your defense to smashing and lethal attacks is increased as weapons and powers like bullets, blades and punches tend to deflect off the shield. This shield also absorbs energy damage, increasing your resistance to those attacks. Luminous Barrier further grants you resistance to Defense Debuffs.
display_short_help: Toggle, +Def(Smashing, Lethal, Energy,Self), Resistance to Defense Debuffs

name: Shimmering_Smash
display_help: You bash your target with your staff. This attack deals minor energy and smashing damage, but recharges quickly and has a chance to reduce your target's ability to be healed for a short time.

name: Shimmering_Bolt
display_help: You launch a burst of energy from your staff at a target, causing minor Smashing and Energy damage. There is also a small chance that the target could be blinded by the radiant projectile.

name: Brilliance
display_help: The invigorating blessing of Brilliance heals you!

name: Luminous_Torrent
display_help: You unleash a powerful cone of light that deals Energy and Smashing damage to your target. This torrent has the chance to reduce the targets' chance to hit and to knock them off their feet.

name: Lightstaff
display_help: The Lightstaff used by the Praetorian Carnival courses with magical energy. Some of this energy is transferred to a target when hit by the staff, which can occasionally cause the target to lose Endurance.

name: Lightstaff_Bolt
display_help: The Lightstaff used by the Praetorian Carnival courses with magical energy. Some of this energy can be fired at a ranged target. On hitting the target, this pulse can erupt in a burst of energy damage that has the potential to temporarily blind the target.

name: Shining_Blast
display_help: You can send a large blast of energy at a foe, dealing heavy damage. There is also a chance that you will reduce your target's chance to hit and their Recovery. Damage: Low, Recharge: Moderate

name: Judgement
display_help: You hold your target in Judgement with your whip, preventing them from moving. While they helplessly tremble under your gaze, they suffer energy damage and are healed less effectively.

name: Radiance
display_help: You unleash a radiant burst in a short radius around you. This deals Energy damage to all targets in the burst. It also has a chance to reduce each target's Endurance and To Hit chance, as well as a smaller chance of Confusing each target.

name: Brilliance
display_help: You channel energy through your body and into a targeted foe. Through transference from the target, some of your health and that of your allies is restored. Additionally, your personal recovery and regeneration are boosted briefly. The targeted foe's regeneration, chance to hit and damage are reduced.

name: Coruscating_Lash
display_help: You channel energy into your whip and lash out at your foe, dealing high energy damage and causing fire damage over time. Lash has longer range than most melee attacks. It will reduce the target's damage resistance and also has a chance to knockdown your target.
display_short_help: Close, High DMG(Energy), Foe -Res, Knockdown, Minor DoT(Fire)

name: Coruscating_Thrash
display_help: You channel energy into your whip and make an impressive sweep, causing high energy damage to enemies within a wide cone and also causing some fire damage over time. Coruscating Thrash has a larger range than most melee cones. Targets that are struck will also have their resistance to damage reduced for a short time and may be knocked down.
display_short_help: Short Ranged (Cone), High DMG(Energy), DoT(Fire), Knockdown, -Res(Foe,All)

name: Resistance
display_help: The Mistresses of the Carnival are a beacon of strength and hope to all who know them. This manifests itself as a significant resistance to Negative Energy attacks.

name: Damage_MN
display_help: The Praetorian Carnival forces are naturally resistant to several types of damage, but have a weakness to negative energy.

name: Damage_LT
display_help: The Praetorian Carnival forces are naturally resistant to several types of damage, but have a weakness to negative energy.

name: Damage_BS
display_help: The Praetorian Carnival forces are naturally resistant to several types of damage.

name: Damage_EB
display_help: The Praetorian Carnival forces are naturally resistant to several types of damage.

name: Damage_AV
display_help: The Praetorian Carnival forces are naturally resistant to several types of damage.
